All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Accounts
Accounts class represent the list of all accounts fetched.
AccountSavingsGoal
AccountSavingsGoal is the data transfer object which represents the savings goal created for an account.
AccountTopUpResponse
AccountTopUpResponse represents the response body of the top-up savings goal endpoint.
AccountV2
AccountV2 class is the data transfer object which represents a single account
CommonUtils
This class has all the helper methods used in the application
CommonUtilsTest
 
Constants
Lists all the constants used in the application
CurrencyAndAmount
CurrencyAndAmount is the data transfer object which represnts the amount and the corresponding currency.
ErrorDetail
ErrorDetail class represents the error message from the savings goal creating and updation.
ErrorResponse
This class represents the generic error response which is used in the GlobalExceptionHandler.
FeedItem
FeedItem is the data transfer object which represents the transaction feed per account.
FeedItems
FeedItems class represent the list of all transaction feeds that are fetched.
FetchAccountsService
This class fetches all the accounts from the system.
FetchAccountsServiceTest
 
FetchRoundUpDifferenceService
This class gets all the transaction feed from per account from a specified start date and calculated the round-up difference.
FetchRoundUpDifferenceServiceTest
 
GlobalExceptionHandler
This is a global exception handler for the application.
RestClientService
This class makes Http GET and PUT requests to fetch and create data as needed.
RestClientServiceTest
 
RestException
This is the customer Rest Exception class.
SavingsGoal
SavingsGoal is the response obtained on creation of a savings goal for an account.
SavingsGoalApplication
 
SavingsGoalController
This is the main class which calls the relevant functionalites/classes to fetch the account, get the transaction feed for the accounts, create savings goal and topup the savings goal.
SavingsGoalControllerTest
 
SavingsGoalRequestV2
SavingsGoalRequestV2 represents the request body used to create the savings goal.
SavingsGoalService
This class creates the savings goal per account and adds the calculated round-up difference amount to the created savings goal.
SavingsGoalServiceTest
 
SavingsGoalTestHelper
 
SavingsGoalTransferResponseV2
SavingsGoalTransferResponseV2 represents the response obtained on successful top up of money to the savings goal.
TopUpRequestV2
TopUpRequestV2 represents the amount which is to be added to the savings goal.
